channel.title: Please help me been stuck for ages with it
channel.description:
ok on my server i can never get the compiler to work allways says not recognised as an internal or exsternal command i cannot seem to solve it please help
thanks jake

item.title: Please help me been stuck for ages with it
item.dc:creator: @brooky979 brooky979
item.description:
@brooky979 wrote:

[quote=“Onix, post:2, topic:441669”]You need the java developer kit to do this.

http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html[/quote]
thanks man

Read full topic
item.source: Please help me been stuck for ages with it

item.title: Please help me been stuck for ages with it
item.dc:creator: @brooky979 brooky979
item.description:
@brooky979 wrote:

[quote=“Onix, post:1, topic:441669”]If you set up the PATH right you can just call javac like this:

@echo off javac *.java pause
Otherwise you will have to manually direct it to the javac file, which will be located where you installed JDK.

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_04\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause[/quote] i dont have javac.exe in my java bin insted its javacpl.exe

Read full topic
item.source: Please help me been stuck for ages with it
